website_summaries.verdict: A large set of seed packets with popular favorites like marigolds and daisies.
pros: Buyer gets at least 15 flower varieties
Price is excellent for a broad range of flowers
There are precise directions on each seed envelope
Some people have used the great variety of seeds as wedding favors or other unique gifts
cons: Buyers should read directions carefully to make sure the seeds meet their requirements for sun and shade and time of year

customer_reviews.title: Old Seeds do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED: SELLER did not respond. So, I had to contact Amazon. AMAZON refunded the $$ for these 2019 SEEDS I have 2 indoor greenhouses. I planted these in pallets that were separated. Placed on seedling warming mats. Less than 5% GERMINATED. The packets were marked for 2019. So, either way, BAD SEEDS.
customer_reviews.author: MOM_2MANY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as a memorial gift
customer_reviews.text: My mother loved flowers. At her funeral, we displayed pictures from her garden and we gave these seeds in memory of our mom. They were perfect. Loved the variety.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C

customer_reviews.title: Stop and smell the roses
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so there are no roses here. But you get a TON of seeds for one great price. Looking forward to getting these started this winter so I can put them in the garden this spring.
customer_reviews.author: El Conquistador

customer_reviews.title: Great variety!
customer_reviews.text: Great variety! Bought the 26 ct & only received 1 kind that was duplicated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: So far only a garden of flower less weeds
customer_reviews.text: 50packets of seeds 3 months later and all I have is 2 small sunflowers, it even full size, and a planter full of flower less weeds. Not sure what is in these, but premium seeds they are not.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy W.

customer_reviews.title: Good germination rate.
customer_reviews.text: Good germination indoors on select few plants once summer hits will let you know about the rest!
customer_reviews.author: Mead

customer_reviews.title: Germinate quick, lots of dupes, don’t grow well though
customer_reviews.text: You do get lots of seed packets. With many duplicates and some undesirable flowers. Germination is usually quicker than what the packet states. Even with a grow light and warm indoor temperatures these plants did not do very well. Some of the seeds didn’t germinate what so ever. There are better options out there.
customer_reviews.author: Hilfa

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my baby shower, they will be gifts so I'm not sure how they will grow. But a good price when you need seeds in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great variety at great price
customer_reviews.text: Great variety at great price. Covers the color spectrum and should have something for various climates.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: These work!
customer_reviews.text: Took a while but I crowd seeded these flowers and now they are popping. I started the sunflowers in a pot then transplanted them to ground soil. Will see how they progress!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favor
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect use them for favors at a baby shower thank you for coming now watch me grow
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve planted 15 packets. They all sprouted in a days. We are waiting for the bloom. Given the current situation, seeds are the best option.
customer_reviews.author: What is a pen name?

customer_reviews.title: Good grow rate!
customer_reviews.text: We gave these out as favors for my Mom's 70th birthday party last fall and planted them this spring. They are growing well!
customer_reviews.author: Cati

customer_reviews.title: They are grey
customer_reviews.text: Well package with instructions. I planted them and have sprouts for some. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Uddi

customer_reviews.title: Very low germination
customer_reviews.text: In some cases no germination or I got 2 plants out of 2 packages.
customer_reviews.author: SEW N SEW

customer_reviews.title: They were perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if they actually grew as I used them as a wedding shower party gift to “ watch love grow”
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old seed packets
customer_reviews.text: Every 150 seed packets are dated to sell by different months of 2019....if their ad had been honest and made that clear that these seeds are old I would never had ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and very reasonable price. Used as a baby shower gift
customer_reviews.author: Andreaka

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I used these packets in family reunion gift bags and they were a big hit! Lots of variety and pretty flowers.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Get them for you or a friend!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! I bought these to mail to my friends during the pandemic to cheer them up. It worked and all my friends had some great days!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Hildebrandt

customer_reviews.title: Excited to see how they grow
customer_reviews.text: Used as party favor. Easy and cheap, wildflower party theme
customer_reviews.author: tasha morgan

customer_reviews.title: Count your packs
customer_reviews.text: I like the variety of seeds. I didn’t like that I ordered a set of 50 and only received 49.
customer_reviews.author: Julius Sabangan

customer_reviews.title: Very good variety of flowers
customer_reviews.text: Used as guest gift in burlap bag with a heart on it. Placed in old wheelbarrow with sign. Take one and watch our love grow
customer_reviews.author: Rose Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can buy variety seeds in bulk like this as our wedding favors.
customer_reviews.author: Racheal

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresented Product
customer_reviews.text: These came up when search category was packages of PERENNIAL plant seeds. They are not perennials, they are all annuals , that was a misrepresentation of your product. Thought I was getting perennial seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: I hope all what they send same as pictures
customer_reviews.text: Some of The flowers in the pictures not matched the ones they send. Now I planted all of them I have 3 like picture and the other is nothing very small flowers
customer_reviews.author: Zaid Al kayyali

customer_reviews.title: Great project
customer_reviews.text: Great product - our participants are going to love a project during the shut down! Thank you. We’ll plant a survival garden upon our return to services
customer_reviews.author: Julie Sterr

customer_reviews.title: Expired Seeds
customer_reviews.text: Product was advertised as 2020 seeds. Packages have Sell By Date of 12/2019.
customer_reviews.author: VA

customer_reviews.title: Nice size package of seeds for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Was used for a new member gift to our new Garden Club members.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product arrived on time and was as described.
customer_reviews.text: The product was distributed at a business conference to promote membership.
customer_reviews.author: Louann Rubel

customer_reviews.text: Maybe I overwatered but none of the packets grill at all
customer_reviews.author: John fisher

product_meta.title: Set of 50 Flower Seed Packets! Flower Seeds in Bulk, 15 or More Varieties Available!
feature_bullets: You will receive atleast 15 different varieties of Flowers Including Marigold, Pinks, Evening Primrose, Shasta Daisy, Forget Me Not, Calendula, Zinnia and More
2020 Seeds Have Arrived. Will last years when kept in cool dry environments
Each variety packed in individual sealed envelope

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars195 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
